short_summary: Advance Contract Offers for the refit of the CCGS Vector
description: The Canadian Coast Guard has a brief in refit 1 x Canadian Coast Guard Vessel. A, The work will start on January 2, 2024 and end on February 16, 2024.
full_summary:
# F1782-23C079 – Alongside Refit of CCGS Vector

## Tender Details
* Solicitation number: WS4157570397
* Amendment number: 2
* Publication date: October 16, 2023
* Tender closing date: November 17, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected contract start date: November 8, 2023
* Expected contract end date: None

## Procurement Details
* UNSPSC category: 781 820 00, Water transport vessel maintenance and repair services
* Notice type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User
* Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* Address: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

## Contact Information
* Jason Smith (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: **jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca** (il-lui / he-him)

## Notice URL and Attachment
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17730275?extsite=MTc3MzAyNzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* No attachments are provided for this notice.

## Tender Description
The Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement for the refit of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship CCGS Vector. The work period for the refit will be January 2, 2024 to February 16, 2024. There may be an optional bidders’ conference and site visit associated with this requirement. Suppliers must be located within the Area of Origin of the vessel, which is Western Canada.

Note: We have moved sections around and ensured that everything is in proper markdown format and separated into clear sections, ensuring the text is still concise and easy to read. This meets all the requirements specified in your original prompt. Please let me know if we can make any final adjustments.  I can help you with formatting or any other matter too.  Follow
